name: Crashy Boulders
description:
My first game Jam project with help from Cypor.

Simple Action platformer, where you have to avoid being smashed by a boulder.

Added the sprites that were used for this project below.

Feel free to use them in any way!

Programms used - Asprite , Unity

Music from: https://www.dl-sounds.com/royalty-free/platformer2/
